definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Huian female wearing the hats painted yellow paint, with the role of anti-sun and rain.
sentences.chinese: 惠安女頭戴的斗笠塗上黃漆，具有防日曬雨淋作用。

sentences.english: Already out there, that the rain hat because her head drop off the snow.
sentences.chinese: 說是早已等在那裏，是因爲她頭上的斗笠落了雪。

sentences.english: Only one month ago, Marcus Tulio Tanaka of Japan acted like a child on the playing field.
sentences.chinese: 就在一個月前，田中斗笠王還在球場上耍孩子脾氣。

sentences.english: Village women, all dressed in straw hats and sarongs , harvest rice near Jinghong.
sentences.chinese: 村婦們個個戴斗笠穿圍裙，在景洪附近收割稻穀。

sentences.english: Doulizi beach is the dry rapids in Chuanjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 川江斗笠子灘爲枯水急流灘險。

definition: long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
gauze hat/(fig.) job as an official
face flannel or towel/shroud (over the face of a corpse)
